actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works with amendment, H. Rept. 93-4.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #11 (283-40).
Measure laid on table, S. J. Res. 42 passed in lieu.

official_title: A joint resolution to extend the life of the Commission on Highway Beautification established under section 123 of the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1970.

summary.text: Extends for one year (until December 31, 1973) the date by which the Commission on Highway Beautification must submit its final report. Increases appropriations authorized for the Commission to $450,000. (Amends 23 U.S.C. 131 nt.)

titles.title: A joint resolution to extend the life of the Commission on Highway Beautification established under section 123 of the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1970.
